content.detailedDescription: myself an my wife were doing some evening yard work and had piled up a bunch of brush to burn in our fire pit. we decided we would burn the brush and sit and watch for some meteors during the meteor shower, at about 955pm i had stood up to warm my back against the fire and i was facing the north west sky i noticed this bright round light moving towards us just over the tree tops behind my house, i quickly noticed it did not have any flashing red white or green lights that are  required  on all aircraft, i said to my wife for her to look at this light coming towards us and over our head, as she saw it she said what is that i said , well i don't know for sure, i can't see any flashing lights like a normal aircraft would have, but we should hear some type of engine noise in a few seconds  as it gets over our heads and past us which is normally the case when you see a normal aircraft going past you then you hear the engine. i also noticed that it appeared to be covering a large amount of distance way faster than any aircraft i have ever seen, and believe me i have seen many, i was an air force brat since the age of 6 and i also almost 9 years active duty in the air force. i said to my wife im gonna get my binoculars that were in my truck approximately 30 feet away from us,i kind of fast walked over to it grabbed them and headed back towards my wife a few steps as i was about to lift the binoculars up towards the object she said in an excited voice it just changed direction, i quickly looked up to get a fix on it with my eyes so i could put my binoculars on it and it appeared to have moved in an easterly direction form when i last saw it and it appeared to be in a hover for a second then just shot straight up and out of sight within about a sec to second and a half, enough to know that it was getting smaller and not simply the light going out. there was no sound at all. we had seen several aircraft flying around before we saw the object all had the typical flashing red , green type lights and sound, as well as after we saw the object. having been around every imaginable aircraft in our arsenal as well as many other countries aircraft, i can tell you for a fact this was not one of our known aircraft. i hope others were out watching the meteor shower and saw the same object.
content.summary: A bright solid white light about size of a pie plate moving at a high rate of speed moving from the nw horizon to about 3/4 sw horizon changing direction at 90 degrees and then shooting straight up out of site no sound. no blinking lights

content.detailedDescription:
Tonight at home, me & 2 others witnessed the familiar star like orb that we see from time to time over our clear skies in low altitude.This time though we got a treat.We saw something that we've never seen this bright orb do before while in flight,it totally vanished right before our eyes.

the sighting was short & only lasted a minute or a few seconds over.I was star gazing for about an hour before the sighting.Matter of fact,every since our last star like orb sighting a few weeks ago,i've made it a point to go outside just after sunset & star gaze for awhile.As always,the very bright object was moving slow in a steady path but in a lower altitude than the last time seen.When gazing,i'm constantly looking around in all directions & the object seemed to just suddenly appear but i could be wrong.As soon as i spotted it i got inside the house as soon as i could & yelled for my wife to come outside.She came quickly & said yeah that's it again,so i yelled for my daughter to come out & look before it got further away.She came outside quickly & was viewing this object when within seconds,it vanished.And that was the shocker because even my daughter couldn't hardly believed that as bright as it was & as clear as we could see it,it just vanished.No trace anywhere,it was gone & out of sight. there were no clouds at the time & the moon was full.I had a cheap video camera on me,figured it was better than nothing but by the time i got the power on,that's when it was gone.See there was no getting fainter & fainter as it glided off into the distance,it was bright in a flight path & like a light switch it was off.

there is something to this folks. i don't know what it is but strange things are going on in our skies.And these bright single star like orbs i believe are unique. we've never witnessed more than 1 at a time.It makes one think of a pure energy source.
content.summary: Bright starlike orb vanishes in flight witnessed by 3

content.detailedDescription:
Ok, i took a picture two years ago and it keeps haunting me because of what turned up in when i reviewed the picture days later. first off, i completely believe we are not alone in this universe but i have never had any person proof, it's always been a gut feeling. i have sat staring at this picture for two years now trying my hardest to convenes myself that what i am seeing can be explained but now i am not sure about that and i wanted to submit the picture to you guys for review.


i was out hunting with my friends and because their was no action that day we decided to go out by the pond and do some skeet shooting. i  take lots of pictures so this event was something i wanted to capture for my memory book. when i reviewed the pictures after i got home one caught my eye and i could have sworn there is a huge flying disk in the sky and it freaked me out because it looks so real and it looks nothing like a plane or helicopter or anything i can make out. i did not see it in the sky at the time i took the picture and it does not appear in any of the other pictures i took at that location. i have not showed it to anyone nor have i tampered with it in anyway. i want you guys to take a look at it and tell me what you think! it might be nothing but i gotta know what yall think. 


thanks guys!
content.summary: Shiny metallic disk

content.detailedDescription:
When sat outside the house i saw multiple white starlike objects come in from a northernly direction, they were differing ranges of brightness and followed a path towards the south, travelling to the same spot in the sky until they dimmed and disappeared. one of them came in from a north east direction and then suddenly changed direction to line up on a path to the south and then dissappearing in the same location as the others. two of the objects crossed the sky paralell in the sky but opposite directions and disspeared at the same time a few seconds after they had crossed paths.
after seeing the first object i felt a shiver in my spine and the hairs on my arms stand on end however i think that this is due to the fact that i had never knowingly seen any objects before and it was both a surprise and excitement. this feeling soon went and after seeing the 7th object i was left feeling excited and very happy to have seen them.
content.summary: Visiting family in us from the uk

content.detailedDescription:
I was chilling at my house watching the los angeles clipper game with my dad in inglewood, ca on 4/20/13 at 8:19 p.M. when my uncle came in and said take a look at this...As i was walking to the door leading outside my house to the backyard   he asked me "are we being invaded?"...I looked up in awe..There was like 20 orb like objects lite up like amber fire hovering in the sky. i instantly thought we were. i was waiting for rays to come out of the ufos. i then felt a chilling tingle and felt more at peace. then grabbed my phone i started taking pictures and video footage. as i was taking footage the orbs started to rise into formation as other ufos with spinning lights (blue, green, red, orange) hovered up out of the tree line. as the others pulled up into formation you could see that an airplane was traveling around the same path that they were in...Some of these lights would blink in and out in a strange sequence. after about 25-30 mins slowly fadded off into a se direction.


youtube footage:
[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Amber fiery orbs and some with spinning changing lights

content.detailedDescription: we were outside playing badmitten on a beautiful sunny day, it was around 7:45 in the evening. i have an injured ankle that was swollen at the time (but i was still capable for outdoor activities) and all of a sudden it felt copmpletely soaked and tingly (my whole right ankle and foot) i didn't want to tell my daughter in case she'd worry about me. i looked up and thought i saw a plane, when it really turned out to be a cigar looking white object floating silently above the treeline. i pointed it out to my daughter, who for some reason didn't take it seriously. i found this weird. as we were playing badmitten, i kept looking at it as it floated silently and slowly above the trees. it was going sw and then suddenly i noticed it was going n. throughtout the duration of this time, i was constantly looking back and forth (quite often) and when i looked up after it turned n, i realised it had disappeared. i pointed it out, once again, to my daughter who actually didn't care and took the time to talk me into staying outside with her. this whole time, as well, i noticed our dog was acting strangely and looking at the trees it flew over. as i looked occasionally with him, i noticed two or three scaly figures walking where he was looking. i tried talking my daughter into going inside again, but she kept insisting everything was fine. our dog started to walk in the direction, very slowly, the ufo had beein flying to. my daughter called for him and as did i, but when he came my daughter suddenly became serious about it all. she told me she saw a golden orange light off in the trees coming from the n angle. however, she once again insisted we stay outside. i then accidentally hit the birdie to my car and she went to get it when she complained to me that she was feeling raindrops when it was a cloudless sky. i felt it as well. walking back, she complained to me that she had goo on her hand, but thought it was a possibility it came from the dog. shortly after, we went inside. i decided to call my father who is interested in ufos. only after when we sat down to report the incident and the time did we realize how short time had really been throughout the sighting and being outside. my daughter and i actually argud about how long we were outside and the specific times and how we both felt we were out for hours. she decided to check the phone history to see when we had come in ( and just saying, i called my boyfriend shortly before we played as well) we realized it had to have happened over 15-20 minutes. looking back, this gives us both shivers down our spines.
content.summary: My 15 year old daughter and i were outside and saw acigar shaped ufo, then felt rain no clouds in sky, daughter had goup on hand, daughter saw golden light in trees i saw 2 entities in same trees. after sighting saw about 7 or 8 jets.

content.detailedDescription:
Was i. my trailer at work while it wad raining once rain subsided went to my car for a cigarette. while smoking felt strong presence looked through front window and observed large cloud with huge object cloaked tithin the cloud.Having heard that et's were telepathic i then closed my eyes and stated i wanna see let me know.Continued to observe object while still cloakef within the cloud move away from me then back toward me several times. i then returned to my trailer and resumed work. upon arriving at work the next morning at approxamently 6am i then cobserved a amber colored object in the sky object proceeded to head west stopped abruptly pulsated getting brighter as it did so then appeared to shake a little and take off back east as if it hap been catapulted somehow. later that day while outside my unit again felt an overwhelming presence at this time i looked into the sky and observed large cloud with structures .This will be the firy photo i submit to yoi. in the photo you will see facial structures whithn the cloud when viewed horozontially however when held diagonally you will notice facial structures resembling the structures on easter island i call them (tiki men). it is my belief et's  are cloaking themselves within clouds  and observing us daily.It is my belief these photos are photogr
aphic proof that we are not alone.
content.summary: Wat at work while employed at qmax america.While sitting in my car observed large cloud with huge dark object hovering within the cloud .Being familar with ufo phenomenon closed my eyes and stated i wanna see let me know.

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 2011 my sister and i were sitting outside on her patio having tea at night before we went to bed, when a bright star began to get larger. being born in the airforce we both thought it was a helicopter. it appeared to be coming straight toward us as if it were heading over the house. we were facing south and it was coming at us from the southwest then changed direction and headed straight north toward us. it became incredibly bright which was when we began to doubt that it was a helicopter. the light became stationary in the sky over the town and flashed a beam. i thought it may be a search helicopter with a very much brighter than usual light searching for criminals or the like. it proceeded toward us again at which point i was looking to see if i could spot a pilot as the light became close enough that if it were a helicopter i should have been able to see occupants in it. it was then that i realized there was no sound coming from it. if it was a helicopter there should have been the chopper blade sounds which are unmistakable. the orb was stationary for approximately a minute then reappeared slightly toward the west as if it had jumped sideways then it simply vanished with no sound or trace. the weirdest thing was that when we checked the time, it was 90 minutes later when it should have been only about 10 minutes. i have always thought that ufo sightings were usaf black ops but this one has me scratching my head wondering.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Noiseless star came straight at us stopped and hovered seemed to have a flash beam hovered for a minute then came closer turned west and vanished

content.detailedDescription: This beam of light is on our moultrie m880 tree cam. i can send an email of the photo.  it was 4 am. there is nothing that could have reflected around there. you can see the times on the cam. something had to trigger the cam also.  it is on our private camp.  off the highway nothing but pine trees around.
content.summary: Beam of light on trail cam

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work at the time i was employed by qmax america. i was on location in gardendale tx. i was in my trailer while it was raining. after the rain subdued i went to my car for a cigarette. while sitting in my car i observerd a large cloud with a huge dark object hovering within the cloud.Being familiar with the ufo phenemonon i then closed my eyey and stated i wanna see let me know and repeated this several timesdue to the fact i could feel a presence and have heard et's are telepathic.Continued watching while cloaked im cloud move away from  me then back toward me it did this afew times before i went back tomtrailer the next morning upon arriving at work at approxamently 6am observed amber colored object hovreing in the sky object proceeded to move west stopped abruptly became stationary appeared to shake a little while pulsating brighter then at the height of pulsation shot off back east as if it was projected from a skeet shoot and eventually disappear.Later that day while sittin outside my unit again felt an overwhelming presence. at this time la cloud of emence size came into view and i proceeded to photograph it .Everysince i've captured numerous photos of unexplained cloud phenomenon containg what i belive apparitions of et's. it is my belief and soon to be yours that et's have the capability to cloak themselves as clouds orco
 within the clouds. it is also my belief they are communicating through the cloud structure in the first file i submitted you will notice several faces in the clouds when held horozontially however when held diagonally you will notice different facial structures resembling the structures on easter island (i call them tiki men). the double sided nature of these cloud structures in my opion proves beyond a shadow of a doubt et is real theu observe us and we are	 not alone. in each photograph submitted you will complex cloud formations use zoom when needed also because yhis phenomenon is foreign to you i think using the method of searching for the eyes in the photos will help you to find structures within the clouds. i have taken the initiave to have some photos blown up into poster and 8 by 10 sizes to be better observed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Observed huge cloud after rain noticed what appeared to be dark object inside cloud moving away from me then back toward me.Due to knowledge of extraterestials being telepathic closed my eyes and stated (i wanna see let me know). comm ensued .

content.summary: Observed huge cloud after rain noticed what appeared to be dark object inside cloud moving away from me then back toward me.Due to knowledge of extraterestials being telepathic closed my eyes and stated (i wanna see let me know). comm ensued .

content.detailedDescription: Much of my childhood i would go to illinois, my father had a job for roofing. my last year there was when i was in 8th grade. during that year (2007) i experienced something out of the ordinary. i woke up in the middle of the night with something standing next to my bed. what made things worse was that i couldn't move at all. only thing i would be able to move were my eyes and eye lids. didn't think much of it even though it felt so real. then again it happened with the same "thing" being next to my bed, again i couldn't move. this would happen three times before i came back to texas on november 2007. the dreams went away. (mind you that i never thought they were dreams, but i considered the fact after letting my parents and brothers know about what was happening.) then it happened again here in my home in texas with something standing next to my bed. the last incident in which the "thing" showed up i was sleeping tv was left on and window was open being 1ft away from me. there was no gusts but it was a cool night. i started moving around to get comfortable. in the middle of my movement i felt a presence again and again i couldn't move. facing the window being paralyzed i could see a figure outside my window. getting use to what was happening to me i closed my eyes tightly till it left. only this time i felt it come in the room. my eyes being shut i felt i wasn't in the room anymore. i heard what closely resembled rain drops. i woke up being morning already. it was the last time i saw it, but it wasn't the last time i would wake up being unable to move. my girlfriend recently moved in with me on february of this year. i told her what would happen to me. like everyone else she didn't really believe it was real. on april 22, 2013 between 3:25-4:30. the strangest thing happened. both me and my girlfriend saw two orange lights small in size but its physical mass could be seen. both resembling circle shape flashed and vanished from my room, as a 3rd light appeared being blue in color appeared flashed and vanished. the lights we both witnessed we not ordinary lights, resembling laser like lights. i believe i have been visited by beings not from here. only conclusion i came up with. hoping for a response on my experiences. thanks.
content.summary: Spheres with laser like light in the center

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west in the 4900 block of camp bowie blvd in fort worth, texas on april 22 at approximately 1:00 pm. no cloud cover. i looked to the south and there was a silver object in the sky moving to the northeast. it was larger than a plane and very silver. my daughter was in the car with me and i told here there was an ufo. she saw it thought it might be a drone. it was silver and would flip on it's side and you could see there was nothing in the middle. the object had some type of cables or lines that were hanging out of it. the object was luminescent (very silver). i turned off of camp bowie to the north and tried to follow it. the entire episode was 30 seconds or a minute. lost sight of it on crestline as the trees blocked our view. was a very strange experience. i do not think it was a weather balloon. i have never observed anything like it before.
content.summary: Circular silver object rotating had a hole in the middle - drone - balloon??

content.detailedDescription: While outside to view meteor showers observed object directly above. immediately thought it was a triangle shaped object. object drifted slowly s.E. over the horizon. i watched it for at least 3 minutes. went back inside, told my wife about the object and drew a sketch along with some notes. than you, twt
content.summary: Triangle shaped object

content.detailedDescription: On april 22, 2013, i went outside to see if i could see the meteor shower. i looked up and immediately saw something that was not a meteor. the same thing i saw for the first time 1 1/2 years ago. last night was the 3rd time seeing this. but, i looked around and saw 2 more. they were in a triangle, miles away from each other. the lights are what caught my eye. they were flashing lights. red, yellow, green, white, and a blue that could have been purple. i watched them for over 45 mins, hoping to see one take off so i could tell myself i wasn't crazy. i'm a skeptic...I'm interested, don't get me wrong. but, still a skeptic. i watched these things move! my friends kept telling me it was meteors, weather balloons, or possibly something sent up to catch a glimpse of the meteor shower. my friend took a walk to see if she could see anything and called me freaking out and scared. she saw all 3 too! we saw them move around a little, but only very short distances. i wanted to watch until they moved, but i couldn't. i can't stop thinking about it. i'm always looking to the sky in hopes of seeing something different and cool, but these scared me.
content.summary: I went out to see if i could see meteors and saw these other things instead. lights flashing

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 11:15 pm, i went outside to smoke a cigarette on my front porch as i do every single night.  from my porch i can clearly see the area where signal point sits.  in fact the normal blinking towers are what i see on any clear night.  i went outside and as i started to sit down i glanced up at the mountain as i always do and just below and to the left of the normal blinking signal light, there was a massive and extremely bright red light.  it was way too large to be the normal things you might expect.. (headlights on a mountain road, an outdoor property light, camp fire in the distance) there is no way it was any of those.  the size and distance would not match.  i called for my husband and he tried to view it through binoculars but we couldn't make anything out other than what appeared to be a massive pulsating fireball.  i watched it for probably 10 - 15 minutes total and it went from a very large and very bright glowing red to a dimmer orange and then began pulsating.  i expected it to move as similar events took place last summer but it did not, it stayed where it was and took on the appearance of a glowing orange orb.  after a few minutes of that, it dimmed even more, brightened up again a bit and then blinked out.
content.summary: Massive red/orange pulsating light in the tree line of signal point post falls

content.detailedDescription:
Seen a white light flying kinda' weeble wobbley through the sky @9:07 - 9:10pm tonight. came from north going south south east making a long wobbley turn more easterly and fading out. no blinking lights, just a bright white dot of light. managed to get a few pics. there were planes flying by in different parts of the sky too. one plane was coming form the east and looked like it would have met up with the light if it hadn't vanished.

no marker lights, just one bright round spherical light. even though it's flight pattern was forward it was going from side to side and up sideways down sideways up then to the side again. but in little movements, not big, "weeble wobble". like a ball rolling forward that has too much weight on one side. it goes forward but the weight pulls it around a little not letting it go exactly straight.

i did try to get some pics with a power pole that has a light on top of it and one with one of the deck post in it. the one with the deck post didn't come out too good and when i took the ones with the light pole was when it was fading out and it didn't even show up in the pictures (which is kind of strange if you ask me). it didn't seem to far, but it wasn't really close. judging by most of the small planes i see, i would say it was lower than most but still a good ways up. maybe mid way between here (our house) and town (turlock). at first it was more less coming my direction at a low angle (35-40deg.??) and might have even flew overhead if it hadn't turned more to the east. no sound that i could hear. but it might have been too far and it was breezy out. i waited for the plane (coming from the east) to pass to see if it would show back up, but it never did. when that plane was closer i couldn't hear it either and it was about in the same location at one point.


picture - i was leaning up against the post and the shutter was open a little longer than a second or so. you can see stars in the background and the flight pattern of the object.
content.summary: A white light flying kinda' weeble wobbley through the sky @9:07 - 9:10pm tonight

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday april 13th,2013
@pprox 8:45p
warm sands area palm springs, ca

my cousin and i were chatting and smoking cigarettes on the porch.  we were observing the upside down big dipper and remarking that orion wasn't visible where we thought it would be. we were generally with our heads up.

i was already gazing to the north as that is the direction my porch chairs currently face (and the big dipper).  over my hedges, then directly over our heads; i noticed shimmering zigzag patterns in the sky that i thought were birds only to realize there was an ominous very clear black outline of a much larger chevron shaped craft. at this point my heart was pounding out of my chest. the zigzags were either reflective or transparent and were shimmering in the shape of smaller chevrons zigzagging. the craft was silent and there was absolutely no discernible propulsion system or exhaust. it seemed to be gliding. once it had reached over our heads there was an umbrella blocking my view. the adrenaline rush propelled me from my chair and i grabbed my cousin out of his and spun him to the south so he could see its departure from our line of sight.  he was describing the same generally fantastic details.  our hearts were visibly pounding for another hour after the event.  we had both noticed the wildlife and bugs had gone silent and in fact it was dead silent during the sighting other than a garden fountain and the traffic on the other side of the walls and hedges, and of course our own heartbeats...
content.summary: Large shimmering chevron ufo-directly over our heads

content.detailedDescription:
For at least 6 months i had seen what i thought was a planet but the only
one it could be was saturn. saturn was too far away to be a disk, especially with the naked eye. and i absolutely always saw it in the same
place, directly up. all other space objects move except the north star and
it was not a star as it was clearly a disk. it could be a sattelite in
geosynchronous orbit but to be that large it had to be immense in size, as
geo-sattelites orbit at 23,000 miles up. i cannot guess what it could be,
as i say, it is always in exactly the same place. so i would label it as
unidentified. i would apprciate e-mails from anyone else who has seen it.
content.summary: Many nights i  had observed venus jupiter and mars. but many nights i observed this (whatever) that seemed like a planet but was always in the same place.  directly above the city. i  would guess it was in space. i observed it as a disk  so not a star.

content.detailedDescription:
There was what looked like a shooting star, moving very fast, but it
seemed low to the earth, just a bright white movement, very fast,
smallish, but brighter than what i remember a shooting star, it did
not look that distant. the light intensity was consistent, a bit brighter than a star but not a fireball or orb the entire time i saw it.
it was also moving horizontal in a straight line, not pointing at any
angle toward or away from the earth.  light intensity abruptly stopped to nothing after shooting across sky
content.summary: Horizontal unwavering light streaks straight across sky at high speed

content.detailedDescription:
I was just going on a bike ride. i rode to this place specifically to take some pictures and admire the view. it was clear sky and there were no birds and no ufo's as far as i knew. later i got home and uploaded one of my pictures to instagram and noticed there was a black object in the sky so i had a look at the other 2 photos i had taken and there were 9 black objects in both photos in different positions from one photo to the other and i took these pictures over a period of 5 minutes.

i have had close to 40 sightings of individual ufos in my life from zig zagging stars to green fluorecent orbs, burning orange balls, cloaked things in the sky and the list goes on.

i am beggining to think that i'm being contacted because i barely know anyone who has seen one unless they have been with me. to see this many is just unheard of. i have a picture of a burning orange ball too.
content.summary: 9 ufo's hovering over brisbane city

content.detailedDescription: ' my girlfriend and i were at home. it was late evening. my girlfriend called to me to come outside and look up at three object flying erratically  above the mountain ridge about one-half mile away.It was a very clear night and we could see the objects moving in what seemed to be erratic movements that was between a standstill to quick back and forth motions all at the same time without colliding with each other.At times it looked as if the were playing with one another or practicing maneuvers.But it went on for a long time, so long we eat he'd then returned back inside. went back out moments later to witness the same actions. this happened a long time back but i still remember the aware experienced, experienced the feeling of witnessing something truly spectacular and a event that i would never be able to explain or forget. they eventually left our sight one at a time and never returned.
content.summary: Three bright orbs or sheres in distant sky above mtn. ridge all flying eradically with abrupt changes of directions and extremly fast speeds . the observation lasted for approximately one hour maybe a little longer.

content.detailedDescription: We were observing the moon when i observed a bright "star above the moon  at about 5 degrees" to the left then it left to an apagee of 45 to 50 degeess in less then 30 seconds it vanishesd
content.summary: 5 degrees above the moon to 160 degrees below the the moon in less than 2 timuets

content.detailedDescription:
Multiple craft visible between 10-12pm -5 eastern time, august 22, 2013
sighting location - owen sound, ontario, canada. 
viewed from: lat 44.599177, lon -80.921860

came out to watch the meteor shower with girlfriend.

control factors - 

2 sober witnesses
clear cloudless conditions
multiple man made aircraft with standard red green flash visible
multiple satalites travelling in smooth arc pattern visible
multiple meteors visible

sighting specifics - 

6 ufo's, 4~ satalites, 3~ meteors, and 5~ jet liners with and without jet trail

assorted ufo descriptions:

1 rainbow flashing ufo, western location, stationary with occasional immidiate sideways movement, stationary after movement to new location. movement judged relative to bright star next to it, movement seen while watching it. other stars in the area did not twinkle, rainbow flashing clearly noticable. brighter then all stars

1 white ufo travelling in straight line up through handle of big dipper relative to horizon, noticable immidiate angular change in direction relative to straight line of the spoon side wall stars. change in speed - slowed, then sped up. brighter then all stars.

4 white ufo's travelling through the spoon of the big dipper. both up and down relative to horizon. noticable smooth worble/wave snake pattern to travel. brighter then all stars in sky. worble varied in speed and amplitude not only for each ufo, but also during each individual sighting. during one sighting a satalite was passing through the handle of the big dipper, difference in brightness, travel speed, and stability of course of flight noticable.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 6 ufo's, clear skies,

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the tailgate of my pickup facing east and looking to the nne. i was waqtching the meteor shower saw 1 almost full moon was very bright and to the south of me.I live in north gainesville but 3 ,miles south of lacrosse which i claim as where i live if anyone asks. at 11:41 pm i noticed a bright lite coming over the tree line if i were to guess where it qwwould have been i would say starke fl. the sky was primarily clear there were a few hi level cirrius clouds. the moon was almost full and waning. as i sat on my tailgate i saw a light coming from the east going west maybe sw.It was as bright as a hundred watt naked bulb at 500 feet. the light then being very bright stopped and seem to go upward and backward. the light got dimmer and as it went upward at a 45 degree angle it got smaller and dimmer and then poof pothing. the entire sighting was approximatly 1 minute or a little less.

my thoughts about this was more or less humdrum , not a very exciting sighting but it mite add a bit to another report. i felt no psychological or psychic effects no rush of adrenaline etc , very cut and drieded.
content.summary: Aspirin size bright white orb shape was gowing slowly from east to west then stopped got dim and shot off upward in a nnw direction got dim and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was watching tv and during the commercials i ran out to check for meteors since tonight is lyrid.
2. was looking for meteors.
3. i thought it was a plane.  i ran in to get a family member to check it out and confirm.
4. object moved erratically but consistently east to west with lots of colorful blinking light.  what caught our attention was it moved way way too fast for the angles it was making. this was no plane.  this is the first time i have seen something nutty like this
5. it did not fly in a straight line it went east to west but not in a straight line not consistent and not an airplane.
6. it headed south toward mexico and i lost a visual.

it is in the first quarter part of the pic bit just a dot.


we are not crazy.

this is awesome
content.summary: Look up for lyrid meteors in the verde valley, az, but that was no meteor.  we followed it across the sky from bascially east to west it was eradic  it seemed to meet 3 others way in the low west say about 15 degrees from the ground. then it just jammed .

content.detailedDescription: Massive glowing orb as seen through night vision. watched as it picked up speed - accelerated and vanished into space. recorded from my backyard.
content.summary: Spotted massive orb like ufo using night vision recording

content.detailedDescription:
Out walking the dog. as i approached the house, several colourful lights appeared from the north at a low altitude in a scattered group, seemingly several miles away. i assumed they were helicopters on a training mission. however, as they came closer i could see no strobes or navigation lights, specifically no green or whites, only red and orange.  

i have a pair of zeiss binoculars inside the doorway of the house so i quickly grabbed them and focused on the group of spread-out lights as they started to veer westwards, still some distance to the north of where i was. these are good binoculars, and i was able to get a detailed look at the objects.

i saw no white aircraft strobes, nor flashing navigation lights. each shape appeared to be the same. they consisted of a broad central band of red/orange colour, with what seemed to be an intense paler hat on the band, and a deep red spot of colour underneath. the shapes and colours pulsed slowly, each cycle lasting perhaps two seconds. as i watched they drifted to the west and each light disappeared in turn, perhaps because of some scattered cloud although i thought the objects were below it. i could hear no noise or distinctive aircraft disruption from that area, despite the wind being from that direction. 

at the same time i was able to clearly see light aircraft in the area, and a civilian passenger jet at high altitude. i was able to hear the noise of these aircraft with no problem. it may have been that the objects i was watching were too far away for oral recognition, but i thought they were within 2 - 4 miles range.

the entire event lasted 2 minutes or so. i estimated the objects were probably travelling between 150 and 300 mph. i found it strange that they disappeared out of sight so suddenly.
content.summary: Multiple glowing shapes appeared from north and veered to the west. no strobes or navigation lights. the colours pulsed slowly

content.detailedDescription: As i wes taking out the trash i stopped to admire the sky. i always try to do this if it's a clear night. i rally enjoy looking at the night sky. as i was scanning the sky i noticed a pulsing light off to the west. i watched it for several minutes. it was a blue pulsating object that was moving very slowly. it made several position changes but always seemed to be moving to the west and northwest. i watched it for about an hour as it slowly moved away. it is still visable as i write this at 10:40 pm, but is so far away as to be very faint.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: About the size of an aspirin held at arms length.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching lyrids meteor shower on nasa channel. not much action then at 9:57 pm an object appeared descending from top to bottom of screen in a straight line. moving to slow to be a meteor, took 5 or 6 seconds to move across the screen. could have been a satellite but i have seen them moving across the sky west to east or south to north not descending straight down. just saw another at 10:19 while typing this almost exact same trajectory and speed. marshall space flight center sky camera, wbcc cocoa,fl  nasa
content.summary: Watching lyrids meteor shower on nasa ch. at 9:57pm est, object appeared at top of screen and moved straight down off screen. not meteor or plane, no blinking lights, maybe satellite. size of  largest star on screen.
